definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_negate"><value name="BOOL"><block type="entity_checkgamemode"><field name="gamemode">CREATIVE</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="item_damage"><value name="amount"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="item"><block type="itemstack_to_mcitem"></block></value><next><block type="item_cooldown_for"><value name="item"><block type="itemstack_to_mcitem"></block></value><value name="ticks"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1200</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></next></block></statement><next><block type="move_entity" inline="false"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="x"><block type="front_x"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="distance"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">4</field></block></value></block></value><value name="y"><block type="front_y"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="distance"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">4</field></block></value><value name="ydisp"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value></block></value><value name="z"><block type="front_z"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="distance"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">4</field></block></value></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
